TopicTitle: Orange suits for Bill, Bob And Jeb :3

Articles.Content:
Just a minor suggestion here, I don't know how career mode is going to evolve, if there's going to be a scripted start to it, with specific missions that take new players by the hand and teach them a few things about rocket construction and orbiting... or if it is going to be open-ended from the very beginning, as it is now.

But just in case the first scenario was what the game more or less will look like, then It would be nice if your starting kerbonauts, Bill Bob and Jebediah, wore their orange space suits not only in IVA mode, but also EVA. It'd be a minor addition, but one I'd really like to see in the final game =)

Spacesuits are white in for a very good reason.

Also you might not have noticed that the other Kerbals also wear different suits on IVA and EVA. Instead of orange they have blue IVA suits.
Mmm, alright. I can see now that EVA suits should stay white. Thanks for the info r4pt0r!
but red stripes on the mission lead would be nice

This has been suggested before, Just saying.

Also there's a mod for this very reason. It's called universe replacer, You can replace textures for everything in the game. If i remember correctly, Universe replacers Reddit page for the textures has a orange uniform for EVA and inside rockets.
I think there should be multiple kinds of space suits, one with american design, one with Soviet design. One with Jeb Design.

This thread lost focus. He was requesting that Bill Jeb and Bob have orange suits but the others be white. I think the orange suits were originally modeled after those worn by astronauts during launch which are orange because if the rocket were to break up and they survived (possibly happened during challenger until they hit the ocean) they could pull their chutes since orange is an unnatural color it stands out helping rescuers find them easier.
